column1: 17377751$Blackwing - Gram the Shining Star$$DARK$[Winged Beast/synchro]$$$$$5$2200$1500$$1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters$$Must first be Synchro Summoned. When this card is Synchro Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower non-Tuner "Blackwing" monster from your hand

56832966$Number S39: Utopia the Lightning$$LIGHT$[Warrior/xyz]$$$$$5$2500$2000$$3 Level 5 LIGHT monsters$$You can also Xyz Summon this card by using a Rank 4 "Utopia" monster you control as material. (Transfer its materials to this card.) Cannot be used as material for an Xyz Summon. If this card battles
column2: your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step. Once per Chain
column4: if this card battles an opponent's monster while this card has a "Utopia" Xyz Monster as material (Quick Effect): You can detach 2 materials from this card; this card's ATK becomes 5000 during that damage calculation only.$$$$$

column1: 16719140$Subterror Nemesis Warrior$$EARTH$[Warrior/effect]$$$$$4$1800$1200$$$$During either player's turn: You can send 1 "Subterror" monster from your Deck to the Graveyard; Tribute this card and at least 1 other monster so the total original Levels Tributed equal or exceed the Level of that "Subterror" monster in the Graveyard
column3: Special Summon that monster in face-up or face-down Defense Position. If a "Subterror Behemoth" monster is flipped face-up while this card is in your Graveyard: You can Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Subterror Nemesis Warrior" once per turn.$$$$$

column1: 30979619$SPYRAL GEAR - Big Red$$SPELL$$$$$$$$$Equip$$$Activate this card by targeting 1 "SPYRAL" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it
column3: equip this card to it. It cannot be destroyed by battle. You can only activate 1 "SPYRAL GEAR - Big Red" per turn.$$$$$
